sentences.sContent: It used materials is 0.4 millimeter stainless steel spring steel of powder coatings.
sentences.sContent_eng: It used materials is 0.4 millimeter stainless steel spring steel of powder coatings.
sentences.sCn: 它使用的材料是0.4毫米的不锈钢弹簧钢，粉末涂层。

sentences.sContent: The phone will use a tiny chip measuring less than one millimeter to detect unpleasant odors, a spokes- woman for Siemens Mobile said.
sentences.sContent_eng: The phone will use a tiny chip measuring less than one millimeter to detect unpleasant odors, a spokes- woman for Siemens Mobile said.
sentences.sCn: 西门子移动动电话公司的一位女发言人说，这种电话用不到一毫米的微小芯片来检测令人不悦的气味。

sentences.sContent: To solve the problem of poor resolution in passive millimeter wave(PMMW) imaging, we present an improved maximum a posteriori(MAP) super-resolution algorithm.
sentences.sContent_eng: To solve the problem of poor resolution in passive millimeter wave(PMMW) imaging, we present an improved maximum a posteriori(MAP) super-resolution algorithm.
sentences.sCn: 针对无源毫米波成像中图像分辨率低的问题，提出了一种改进的最大后验（MAP）超分辨算法。

remMethod.val: milli(毫， 千分之一)+metre(米)→毫米
